alert.note: Alert for Clay; Kanawha; Northwest Fayette; Northwest Nicholas (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 4:12AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Nicholas, east central Kanawha, southwestern Clay and northwestern Fayette Counties through 445 AM EDT... At 411 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gauley Bridge, or 11 miles northwest of Fayetteville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clay, Montgomery, Ansted, Smithers, Gauley Bridge, Hawks Nest State Park, Powellton, Handley, Bickmore, Swiss, Indore, Bentree, Drennan and Pond Gap. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
